text:
Which source has inspired me to do these studies ?
Above all, during 2 years, I have living in Paris with my parents and my brother. So, I have studied 2 years in the International French High school of Paris.
The second year, we have to do an internship of one week. So I did this one in a recruitment society, called "Robert Walters Japan". I worked in the financial department of this society. The office where this department were located was also composed of the human resources department and the communication department.
When I was there, I should speak in English and sometimes in Japanese or French. So during all my internship I have essentially spoken in English.
In other hand, when I worked, I heard all days the people of the communication department working by switching every time between different kind of speaking, like French then English or Japanese then German.
I really like speaking, and I already knew that I would make it my job or make something in this kind of job. And when I heard those people, I have telling to myself that it was this kind of job I would make.
After that, I searched all the information about it, and it finally leads me to these studies of information and communication.
